# PriorityQueue&lt;T&gt;.Peek method

Returns (without removing) the smallest item in the [`PriorityQueue`](../PriorityQueue-1.md). This operation takes O(1) time.

```csharp
public T Peek()
```

## Return Value

The smallest item in the [`PriorityQueue`](../PriorityQueue-1.md).

## Exceptions

| exception | condition |
| --- | --- |
| InvalidOperationException | The priority queue is empty. |
